choices.text: A request to merge your branch into another branch, with code review

question: Where do you create a pull request?

choices.text: On the Git hosting platform (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket)

question: What should a good pull request include?

choices.text: Just the code changes, nothing else
A clear title, description, and context about the changes

question: Pull requests allow team members to review and discuss code before merging.
What happens after a pull request is approved and merged?

choices.text: The feature branch is automatically deleted forever
The changes from the feature branch become part of the target branch
